description: The Furaingu Kaizoku-dan are a pirate crew led by Vander Decken IX, floating over the ocean floor and endangering the citizens of Fishman Island. The crew is possibly named after the flagship used by Vander Deckens for nine generations, the Flying Dutchman. The captains of the Furaingu Kaizoku-dan and the Shin Gyojin Kaizoku-dan Pirates have sworn an alliance with each other.
name: Flying Kaizoku-dan
